channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Kenny Chesney & More Country Stars Added to Farm Aid 40th-Anniversary Lineup
item.description: Yeehaw! 🤠 Country music legends join Farm Aid lineup for a boot-scootin' good time! 🌾🎶 #FarmAid40 #CountryMusicFest

item.title: Stray Cats Plot First Shows Since Brian Setzer’s Autoimmune Disease Diagnosis
item.description: 🎸 Stray Cats roar back! Ready to rock after Brian Setzer's comeback! 🐾 #RockabillyRevival #StrayCatsAreBack

item.title: Paramore’s Hayley Williams Uploads 17 New Songs to Her Website
item.description: 🚀 Dive into a treasure trove of fresh tunes from Paramore's Hayley Williams! Check out her 17 new songs on her website now! 🎶💥 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Coldplay Kiss Cam Captures Lionel Messi and Wife Antonela
item.description: Love is in the air at the Coldplay concert! 💏🎶 Lionel Messi and Antonela steal the show on the kiss cam! 💋 #Coldplay #Messi #MusicLove

item.title: Ally Brooke Celebrates the 13th Anniversary of Fifth Harmony’s Formation: ‘Changed My Life’
